general.message:
TPR Build 82 is available for Android and Appimage.

What's New?  DPD_Extras extensions
New fix for tabs that stop shifting of text.
Latest PEU from October, 2024 that is 90% edited.  
 Extensions has folders now
  Access the youtube channel via the menu on the settings

May this dhammadāna be a cause for Nibbāna for the programmers and volunteers of this app and also for all beings and past relatives.

windows.message: Build 82 submitted awaiting MS Appstore approval
